com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.encoding

Class EncoderWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.encoding.EncoderWrapper

  • public class EncoderWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class around MediaCodec. Accepts raw frame data in YUV420 format as an input, sends it to the encoder, notifies the listeners when encoding is complete. All happens on the same thread
